get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of Users that can be filtered, sorted, and preloaded.

post.description: Create a new User with the provided data, with validation and will return the created entity.

get.description: Retrieve a single User by its unique identifier (ID), with optional preloaded relationships.

patch.description: Update an existing User by its ID with the provided data, and return the updated entity.

delete.description: Soft delete the specified User by its ID. This action is reversible.
Permanently delete the specified User by its ID. This action is irreversible.

patch.description: Restore a previously soft-deleted User by its ID and then return the restored entity.
